director.title: Director of the College
director.subtitle: News, messages and director's blog
director.about_text: Zhaniya Onalbayeva Sarmurzina is an experienced and dedicated leader in the field of education. She was born in the Mangystau region. She holds a higher education degree from the A.S. Pushkin Oral Pedagogical Institute, majoring in Kazakh Language and Literature Teaching. She also holds a Master’s degree in Technical Sciences.
director.career: She began her career in education. From 1992 to 1996, she worked as a teacher in the schools of the village of Shetpe, Mangystau region. From 1996 to 2004, she was a teacher at secondary school No. 20 in Aktau. From 2003 to 2013, she served as the deputy director for scientific and methodological work at the Mangystau Polytechnic College. Since 2013, she has worked in the Department of Technical and Vocational Education of the Mangystau Regional Education Administration. Since September 2025, she has been appointed as the director of the Mangistau College of Tourism.
director.principles_text: Motto: “Quality education is the key to a bright future.” Under Zhaniya Onalbayeva’s leadership, the college’s main goal is to train highly qualified specialists in the field of tourism and services who will contribute to the socio-economic development of the region. She actively promotes quality improvement in education, the implementation of innovative teaching methods, and the systematic development of educational and moral programs, thereby strengthening the reputation of the college.
director.write_message: Write a message to the director
director.post_excerpt: Short announcement of the director's publication. Date and text preview.
director.post_reports_excerpt: Short description of past events and achievements.

feedback.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
feedback.error: Failed to send the message. Try later.
